title: BC端出错
author: httu
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
wanghan124 发表于 2020-2-26 21:09
server_connect_timeout: 5000
custom_server_name: HexaCord
forge_support: false
请不要使用中文 服务器名改为英文的

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: yaml格式错误 上传一下你的config.yml

replies.author: wanghan124
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-2-26 21:01
yaml格式错误 上传一下你的config.yml
server_connect_timeout: 5000
custom_server_name: HexaCord
forge_support: false
always_handle_packets: false
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
timeout: 30000
log_commands: false
online_mode: false
servers:
  登录服:
    motd: '&4欢迎进入测试跨服'
    address: localhost:25565
    restricted: false
  测试服:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: 114.67.104.223:25575
    restricted: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - 登录服
  - 测试服
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
  max_players: 1
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
log_pings: true
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
network_compression_threshold: 256
remote_ping_cache: -1
connection_throttle: 4000
stats: 6a2d5a51-42c8-4eaf-9338-3af37382eac8
connection_throttle_limit: 3
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
prevent_proxy_connections: false

replies.author: 凉凉丶
replies.txt_content: 登录服的MOTD要用英文的如果你想加MOTD（彩色的）要另外给登录服加COLORMOTD插件
